item.title: 5/25/2025: An Island Off An Island; Caligula's Gardens; Return to Gorongosa

item.title: Ex-police chief convicted of rape, murder escapes from Arkansas prison
item.description: Grant Hardin, a former police chief who was convicted of rape and murder, escaped from prison in Arkansas on Sunday.
